author: deedubbu
msg: Fixes #38. contact attribs should return null instead of empty array
The implementation is currently returning an empty array for the
following Contact attributes: phoneNumbers, emails, addresses,
organizations, categories, urls and photos.  Return null unless the
array has a length greater than 0.

author: filmaj
msg: Removed illegal_argument_exception (not in android), and added underscores between words of error names. Fixes #29

author: doc
msg: Add plugins.xml as the place to specify what APIs your application uses. Remove ability to add plugins via JavaScript

author: deedubbu
msg: Fixes #39. Fix errors in FileReader/FileWriter found by MobileSpec.
Address several failures reported by MobileSpec test suite for the
- Change the encoding of writes with the FileWriter API to use
UTF-8 instead of the BlackBerry default of ISO-8859-1
- Truncate the file to the seek position before writing new
data in order to match behavior on other platforms.  Return the
length of the file as the seek position plus data written.

author: deedubbu
msg: Add support for targetWidth and targetHeight to camera API.
